Class BettingSoft

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uv1.bettingServices.BettingSoft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Betting

    public class BettingSoft
extends java.lang.Object
implements Betting
    Since:
    24/05/2013
    This class implements methods of the interface Betting.

    • manager password validity:
      • only letters and digits are allowed
      • password size should be at least 8 characters
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    prou + mallet

      • subscribe

        public java.lang.String subscribe(java.lang.String a_name,
                         java.lang.String a_firstName,
                         java.lang.String a_birthDay,
                         java.lang.String a_username,
                         java.lang.String a_managerPwd)
                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                  ExistingSubscriberException,
                                  BadParametersException
        From Betting interface (non-Javadoc)
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        a_name - the last name of the subscriber.
        a_firstName - the first name of the subscriber.
        a_birthDay - the username of the subscriber.
        a_managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Returns:
        password for the new subscriber
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if a subscriber exists with the same username.
        BadParametersException - raised if last name, first name or username are invalid.

                    throws AuthenticationException,
                           ExistingCompetitionException,
                           BadParametersException,
                           CompetitionException
        Add a new competition
        Parameters:
        a_competition - Competition's name
        a_closingDate - End date
        competitors - Collection of competitors
        a_managerPwd - Manager's password
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - The manager's password is wrong
        ExistingCompetitionException - The competition is already existed
        BadParametersException - invalid parameters
        CompetitionException - The end date is invalid
